name: Tartan Marketing
description: We're a full-service B2B marketing agency that helps clients energize their brands and grow their businesses. At Tartan Marketing, our Scottish roots run deep and for us, plaid isn't just a pattern, it's a way of life. We're a lively bunch of brand advocates who welcome a good challenge and aren't afraid to question the status quo. With our smart, intuitive thinking, compelling messaging and flawless execution, we help our clients "move the needle" and get measurable results.
